name: Open Air
description:
An escapist game about very important topics: finding yourself, gaining confidence and knowing your inner world. Our hero was dreaming about going to music festival since he first heard about it, but unfortunatelly festival got cancelled in the last minute. He decides that he won’t give up that easily, our hero explores the island, it’s residents and his inner world in order for the big party to take place.



Explore the island
An open world in front of you, small and compact, but still open!



Make new friends
Communicate with the islanders and help them to solve their problems.



Search for treasures
There are many secrets and easter eggs hidden on the island, can you collect them all?



Enjoy the music festival
Hippies, punks, anarchists, rockers and metalheads, we have a riff for everyone!



Learn something new about yourself
Meditate at the altars, discover new sides of yourself.



Made by a small team
We are not a huge team, we were afraid for a long time to make a "dream game". But here it is in front of you, what do you say?
